summary: I was never happy with the default look of Serana or the mods which change her appearance, so I decided to combine plenty of mods for her together to create my own and I thought I'd share it incase anyone else had the same problem.
descriptionHtml:
I was never happy with the default look of Serana or the mods which change her appearance, so I decided to combine plenty of mods for her together to create my own and I thought I'd share it in case anyone else had the same problem.

The mods I included in it were:

>Seductress Serana by damnyou123 (Default Hair)
>BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes by Aipex8 (Just for the fangs)
>Underworld Dawnguard - Vampire and Werewolf Eyes by Anardion (Blue version)

(Available For All Body Mods)

I have also included an updated file which gives her long hair for those who said the default hair looked like a monk with a wig, you will only need one file not both of them.
author: SpaffySausage

files.name: Serana At Her Best - With Long Hair
